article_title: Summit examines ways to deliver proper treatment to R.I.'s mentally ill
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: WARWICK, R.I. — Recognizing that the state is falling short when it comes to caring for people with behavioral health problems — and too often imprisoning those struggling with addiction and mental illness instead of treating them — Governor Raimondo and other top state officials convened a day-long conference on Monday to discuss what's wrong with the state's health-care system and to identify potential solutions.Close to 250 health care and social service providers heeded
article_metadata.author: Rich Salit
